channel.title: php on (power up)
channel.description: Recent content in php on (power up)

item.title: 记一次php5.3.10安装
item.description: 安装环境 1 2 CentOS 6.6 x64 php 5.3.10 安装编译工具 1 yum install -y gcc gcc-c++ 安装mysql 1 2 3 yum install -y mysql mysql-devel #如果是64位系统，执行 ln -s /usr/lib64/mysql/* /usr/lib/ 安装依赖 1 2 3 4 yum install -y libxml2-devel openssl-devel libcurl-devel libjpeg-turbo-devel libpng-devel
